titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the right worshipful company of merchants trading into the Levant, at St. Olaves Hart-Street London, Tuesday June, 2. M.DC.LXVIII. By Tho. Smith, M.A. fellow of Magdalen College in Oxford, and chaplain to the right honourable Sr. Daniel Harvey, His Majesties embassadour to Constantinople.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Thomas, 1638-1710.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T. Roycroft, for S. Mearn, book-binder to the King's most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: With imprimatur leaf signed: Sam. Parker; and dated: Jun. 15. 1668.
Reproduction of the original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.

person.persName: S. Mearn, book-binder to the King's most excellent Majesty
